reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s a wonderful keyboard, good job I feel it\'s awesome, it\'s works excellent on HTC desire v
reviews.author: kunal desurkar

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Its cool its good but i really wanted the emoj pluhin but it doesn\'t work with Android
reviews.author: Alejandra Quezada

reviews.title: Good apps
reviews.comment: Now can easier to type the words you desired. All wonderful creative.
reviews.author: jerson villa

reviews.comment: Marvelous, out of the world, Febulas,  Excellent,  I find less appriciative words to praise it.\tMarvellous,  Very Very much Useful  PAUL SINGH
reviews.author: Paul Singh

reviews.title: Good again
reviews.comment: Though it would be nice if you guys took more of the sliding feature into consideration. Yea the keyboard has it but it literally feels like you just put it in because everyone else did make it better, add different color trails and make it have better predictions when sliding
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good. Actually awesome
reviews.comment: After updates it works perfect, couldn\'t do without it!! Starting to love Go products again big thumbs up devs
reviews.author: Onder Sevik

reviews.title: This is good but
reviews.comment: If swype gets fixed then this will be a 5star keyboard other than swype this is great the keyboard looks amazing and I love that you can control the vibration and transparency on the keyboard
reviews.author: Raymond Adams

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.comment: OMG I love it. It\'s awesome and very useful I love all of it\'s features and the fact that you can customize it \356\220\225.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate you can\'t see emojis
reviews.comment: Pantech discover- I would just like to be able to see the emojis as I type them. And is there anyway we can be able to see other people\'s emojis? that would make this application five \342\230\206\342\230\205\342\230\206\342\230\205\342\230\206\'s
reviews.author: Ne\'Shia Holden

reviews.title: I\'m lovin it
reviews.comment: Tried six different keyboards ,the best By far...thank you. Prediction not amazing yet but it not a.biggy.  great work guys
reviews.author: Gal Shaul

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: There is a bug where the keyboard randomly switches and rearranges the keys and the only way to fix it is to scroll through hitting the \"EN \" key on the keyboard. Very frustrating. Also it has other small things that make it more of an inconvenience to have. The other bugs I can live with but this key switching needs to be resolved. When it is I\'ll go up in my rating.
reviews.author: Stephen Fuchs

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It does not go down when I exist my message or any other place. It irritates me lot. And also when I am typing, it will suddenly hang there and switch to the other layout. Please fix this ! Its very irritating ._.
reviews.author: Tan Kim Kee

reviews.comment: I really liked this but the keyboard switched and it won\'t go back with the y & z being switched. Aggravated enough to consider uninstalling. Remedy quickly please!
reviews.author: Elise LaForge

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good app  It works very good in my HTC incredible S 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best emoji keyboard
reviews.comment: Best keyboard, for android, very easy to use, very intuitive, and has lots of emoticons, great A+
reviews.author: Astrid Cardenas

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: I love it but I have to constantly keep going to settings and choosing this as my keyboard. It\'s really annoying.
reviews.author: Nicky V

reviews.title: Need to update
reviews.comment: This app one of the best ever. I think this is the best keyboard I\'ve tried so far. One problem is that sometimes when I\'m using it, it doesn\'t  type. Like when I\'m using the keyboard no letter shows up and I need to type over and over until it works. But other that that, this is the best  app ever.
reviews.author: brynt Antenero

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: One of the best and useful app I have seen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost the best
reviews.comment: I love the way you can control what it looks like and what it does. It keeps coming off though, it switches back to my old keyboard...anyway I can fix that? Anyways almost great. Space is hard to press, but that might just be me...
reviews.author: Johncel Perez

reviews.title: can\'t fully disable T9 Nexus 4
reviews.comment: I love this app, never crashes, and I use the telephone style keyboard. I followed instructions on how to disable the T9 on both the go keyboard settings, and on the nexus 4\'s stock keyboard.  But for some reason, it only disables on some appz, most it comes on by default.  If someone can help me turn it off for all apz and by default will gladly give this app 5stars  thanks in advance, raven
reviews.author: Raven Hamblett
